tool_description: Analyzes classification predictions and assigns confidence scores based on model certainty, feature consistency, and historical performance.

prediction_batch.description: Array of product identifiers with predictions to score

model_id.description: Identifier of the classification model used for predictions

scoring_method.description: Confidence scoring method: probability_based, ensemble, or hybrid

error_messages: Empty prediction batch: At least one prediction must be provided for scoring
Invalid model ID: The specified model does not exist or is not accessible
Invalid scoring method: Use one of [probability_based, ensemble, hybrid]
Scoring failed: Unable to calculate confidence scores for the predictions
usage: Provide prediction_batch and model_id, optionally specify scoring_method. The tool returns detailed confidence analysis for each prediction.

predictions_scored.description: Number of predictions that received confidence scores

average_confidence.description: Average confidence score across all predictions

high_confidence_count.description: Number of predictions with high confidence (>0.8)

low_confidence_count.description: Number of predictions with low confidence (<0.5)

confidence_scores.description: Individual confidence scores for each prediction
